name: Where home is
description:
Made for the Global Game Jam 2019 based on Globant Mar del Plata.

'Where Home Is' is a 2D platformer where you play as a man who's trying to get back home just after a terrible earthquake goes on. In order to do so, he'll have to make his way through destroyed streets and houses, avoiding dangers and taking any useful object he can find.

--credits--

PROGRAMMERS:

* Hernán Amarillo

* Giuliano Decesares

*Jonathan Egea

*Francisco Javier Tsushima

2D ARTISTS:

* Martín Gándara

* Ailen Silva

*Mario Redondo

LEVEL DESIGNERS:

* Tomás Saez

SOUND DESIGNER:

* Guido Fazzito
